DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to describe the epidemiology of fungal blood infections in Spain (with emphasis on the incidence, fungal species distribution and antifungal susceptibility). The study is to be performed in five big cities which represent different geographic areas: Barcelona, Bilbao, Madrid, Sevilla and Valencia.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Population Study on Candidemia in Spain
DOC.criteria: Fungal isolate obtained from blood sample
